skills.name: Poison Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

skills.name: Geologist
skills.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.

skills.name: Hunger Resistance
skills.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 50%.

skills.name: Divine Blessing
skills.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Palico Rally
skills.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.

skills.name: Botanist
skills.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

skills.name: Entomologist
skills.description: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.

skills.name: Intimidator
skills.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

skills.name: Resuscitate
skills.description: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

skills.name: Paralysis Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.

skills.name: Fortify
skills.description: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

skills.name: Iron Skin
skills.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 50%.

skills.name: Sleep Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.

skills.name: Blast Resistance
skills.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.

skills.name: Wide-Range
skills.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.

skills.name: Speed Sharpening
skills.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.

skills.name: Stun Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

skills.name: Recovery Speed
skills.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

skills.name: Slinger Capacity
skills.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.

skills.name: Windproof
skills.description: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.

skills.name: Earplugs
skills.description: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.

skills.name: Blight Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.

skills.name: Horn Maestro
skills.description: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

skills.name: Weakness Exploit
skills.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 10% increased affinity, with an extra 5% on wounded parts.

skills.name: Non-elemental Boost
skills.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

skills.name: Protective Polish
skills.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

skills.name: Guard Up
skills.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

skills.name: Special Ammo Boost
skills.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.

skills.name: Normal Shots
skills.description: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

skills.name: Heroics
skills.description: While active, increases defense by 50 points

skills.name: Guard
skills.description: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.

skills.name: Latent Power
skills.description: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

skills.name: Agitator
skills.description: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 5%.

skills.name: Critical Boost
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.

skills.name: Artillery
skills.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.

skills.name: Mushroomancer
skills.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.

skills.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
skills.description: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

skills.name: Spread/Power Shots
skills.description: Increases the attack power of spread ammo, power shot arrows, and Thousand Dragons.

skills.name: Focus
skills.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.

skills.name: Bow Charge Plus
skills.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

skills.name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
skills.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

skills.name: Piercing Shots
skills.description: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

skills.name: Offensive Guard
skills.description: While active, increases attack power by 5%.

skills.name: Coalescence
skills.description: While active, grants attack +12, element attack power +30, and status buildup + 5%.

skills.name: Poison Resistance
skills.description: Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

skills.name: Paralysis Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

skills.name: Sleep Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

skills.name: Stun Resistance
skills.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

skills.name: Blast Resistance
skills.description: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

skills.name: Iron Skin
skills.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 75%.

skills.name: Hunger Resistance
skills.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 100%.

skills.name: Recovery Speed
skills.description: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

skills.name: Intimidator
skills.description: Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

skills.name: Palico Rally
skills.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.

skills.description: Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

skills.description: Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

skills.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.

skills.name: Special Ammo Boost
skills.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

skills.name: Botanist
skills.description: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.

skills.name: Geologist
skills.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.

skills.name: Aquatic/Polar Mobility
skills.description: Increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.

skills.name: Entomologist
skills.description: Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.

skills.name: Horn Maestro
skills.description: Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
